How to participate to win?

To qualify for one of the four prizes of One-day experiencie or $1,500 USD gift card, customers must reach debit card spending goals and make purchases in a minimum number of categories.

Make all your payments with your Butterfield Mastercard Debit Card

1

Be aware of your spending goal, industry categories and cash withdrawals limit.

2

Keep the limit of (9) cash withdrawals to unlock the $1.500 USD gift card.

3

Once the campaign ends, we will conduct the raffle and notify the winners

4
